derivation: or מִקְוֵה; (1 Kings 10:28), or מִקְוֵאlemma מִּקְוֵא extra dagesh, corrected to מִקְוֵא; (2 Chronicles 1:16), from H6960 (קָוָה);
outline:
1. hope
    1. hope
    2. ground of hope
    3. things hoped for, outcome
  2. collection, collected mass
kjv_def: abiding, gathering together, hope, linen yarn, plenty (of water), pool.
strongs_def: something waited for, i.e. confidence (objective or subjective); also a collection, i.e. (of water) a pond, or (of men and horses) a caravan or drove
